MajorClaims.Text: I disagree with the idea that unimportant subjects such as music and sports should be got rid of the program
the effects of learning music, sports are profound

Claims.Text: students only need to study academic subjects like mathematics, physics
these subjects might fulfil the students' ability
the academic subjects play a primary role in nurturing children

Premises.Text: these subject are necessary for students' future
when labor market now has high competition; students have to meet requirements regard of qualification
the unemployment rate is always high
parents want children to study these subjects which can help students have a job
there are many things much more important than having a job
studying music, art or sports is also very important to students
This enables students to develop their potentials through discovering the natural world around them
to get a job in labor market, not only do students require hard skills but also soft skills such as teamwork, presentation
through taking part in a sport, students can understand team spirit and learn lessons about teamwork skills
children's future do not depend heavily on the academic subjects they study in school, it is the result of their efforts and capacity
